languages.text: "Мы с тобой спустимся в недра твоего вед... корабля. Мы найдем отсек, полный ничего не подозревающей добычи. Мы вырежем их всех — всех до последнего. И с каждой измученной нами жертвой страх новой добычи будет все расти и расти, становиться все слаще и гуще... там, в этом горниле страстей, ты познаешь душу истинного эльдара. Мою душу".

"Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."
languages.original_text: "Мы с тобой спустимся в недра твоего вед... корабля. Мы найдем отсек, полный ничего не подозревающей добычи. Мы вырежем их всех — всех до последнего. И с каждой измученной нами жертвой страх новой добычи будет все расти и расти, становиться все слаще и гуще... там, в этом горниле страстей, ты познаешь душу истинного эльдара. Мою душу".

And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

"Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

languages.text: “随我一起下到这艘船的底层甲板。到了那里，我们会找到一大群毫无防备的猎物。我们要把他们全都杀光，一个不留。每当我们折磨着猎物时，其他猎物心中的恐惧就会变得越来越强、越来越浓烈、越来越甜蜜……在那里，在激情的熔炉之中，你将会见识到真正的艾达灵族的灵魂。我的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

traits.locale_text: “随我一起下到这艘船的底层甲板。到了那里，我们会找到一大群毫无防备的猎物。我们要把他们全都杀光，一个不留。每当我们折磨着猎物时，其他猎物心中的恐惧就会变得越来越强、越来越浓烈、越来越甜蜜……在那里，在激情的熔炉之中，你将会见识到真正的艾达灵族的灵魂。我的灵魂。”

languages.text: 「共にこの化け物の腹の中に…お前の船の深部まで降りて行こうじゃないか。それから何も疑ってすらいない獲物だらけの区画を探す。俺達は全ての人間を…最後の一匹に至るまで駆逐するんだ。被害者は全て存分に苦しめ、次の獲物の恐怖心をどんどん大きくしていくことで、獲物の恐怖心はだんだんと甘く、濃くなっていく…そう、情熱の坩堝の中で、お前は真のアエルダリの魂を知る。俺様の魂をな」
languages.original_text: "Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

traits.locale_text: 「共にこの化け物の腹の中に…お前の船の深部まで降りて行こうじゃないか。それから何も疑ってすらいない獲物だらけの区画を探す。俺達は全ての人間を…最後の一匹に至るまで駆逐するんだ。被害者は全て存分に苦しめ、次の獲物の恐怖心をどんどん大きくしていくことで、獲物の恐怖心はだんだんと甘く、濃くなっていく…そう、情熱の坩堝の中で、お前は真のアエルダリの魂を知る。俺様の魂をな」

languages.text: «Juntos descenderemos a las entrañas de esta ba... de tu nave. Encontraremos un compartimento lleno de presas desprevenidas. Los mataremos a todos y cada uno. Con cada víctima que torturemos, el miedo de las otras presas irá creciendo, volviéndose más espeso y dulce... En ese crisol de pasiones, conocerás la verdadera alma de los Aeldari. Mi alma».
languages.original_text: "Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

traits.locale_text: «Juntos descenderemos a las entrañas de esta ba... de tu nave. Encontraremos un compartimento lleno de presas desprevenidas. Los mataremos a todos y cada uno. Con cada víctima que torturemos, el miedo de las otras presas irá creciendo, volviéndose más espeso y dulce... En ese crisol de pasiones, conocerás la verdadera alma de los Aeldari. Mi alma».

languages.text: « Vous et moi allons descendre dans les entrailles de ce monstre de métal qui vous sert de vaisseau. Nous allons trouver un compartiment rempli de proies innocentes et nous allons les massacrer, toutes autant qu'elles sont. Pour chaque victime que nous torturerons, la peur des suivantes ne cessera de croître, de gagner en saveur et en consistance... C'est là, dans ce creuset de souffrance, que vous apprendrez à connaître l'âme véritable des Aeldaris. Mon âme. »
languages.original_text: "Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

traits.locale_text: « Vous et moi allons descendre dans les entrailles de ce monstre de métal qui vous sert de vaisseau. Nous allons trouver un compartiment rempli de proies innocentes et nous allons les massacrer, toutes autant qu'elles sont. Pour chaque victime que nous torturerons, la peur des suivantes ne cessera de croître, de gagner en saveur et en consistance... C'est là, dans ce creuset de souffrance, que vous apprendrez à connaître l'âme véritable des Aeldaris. Mon âme. »

languages.text: "Gemeinsam werden wir in die Tiefen dieses Bocks hinabsteigen – Euer Schiff. Dort finden wir ein Abteil voll mit ahnungsloser Beute. Wir werden sie alle abschlachten – jede einzelne Kreatur. Und mit jedem gefolterten Opfer wird die Angst der wartenden Beute größer und größer, süßer und süßlicher ... dort, im Schmelztiegel der Leidenschaft, werdet Ihr die wahre Seele der Aeldari erkennen. Meiner Seele."
languages.original_text: "Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."

traits.locale_text: "Gemeinsam werden wir in die Tiefen dieses Bocks hinabsteigen – Euer Schiff. Dort finden wir ein Abteil voll mit ahnungsloser Beute. Wir werden sie alle abschlachten – jede einzelne Kreatur. Und mit jedem gefolterten Opfer wird die Angst der wartenden Beute größer und größer, süßer und süßlicher ... dort, im Schmelztiegel der Leidenschaft, werdet Ihr die wahre Seele der Aeldari erkennen. Meiner Seele."

languages.text: "Birlikte bu tenek... Geminin derinliklerine ilerleyeceğiz. Kendimize saf avlarla dolu bir kompartıman bulacağız. Hepsini kesip biçeceğiz. Geriye hiçbirini sağ koymayacağız. İşkence ettiğimiz her bir kurbanla birlikte bekleyen avların korkusu da gittikçe artarak daha tatlı ve yoğun bir hâl alacak. İşte bu tutkunun tam kalbinde Aeldari ruhunun... Benim ruhumun manasını bulacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Together we will descend into the bowels of this buck— your ship. We will find a compartment full of unsuspecting prey. We will slaughter them all — every last one of them. And with each victim we torture, the fear of the waiting prey will grow and grow, becoming sweeter and thicker... there, in that crucible of passion, you will know the true Aeldari soul. My soul."
